question: Which company has launched India's first PolicyHack for Teachers?
explanation: India\'s first PolicyHack for Teachers has been launched by Dell in partnership with the UNESCO Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Education for Peace and Sustainable Development (MGIEP) and Ignus. As a part of its three-city PolicyHack series, Dell hosted an interactive hackathon where teachers focused on their learning journey. Itâ€™s first-of-its-kind hackathon for teachers which will  create a platform where teachers, school representatives and a cross-sectional group experts related to education can interact with each other.
